description:
At the Lanier Law Group P.A. in Jamestown, North Carolina, we are fully committed to helping you obtain the full amount of compensation you need following a debilitating injury or devastating loss that has left you and your family struggling and wondering how you will make ends meet. You do not have to fight your battle alone because you have a devoted legal advocate ready to step in and fight for your rights and entitlements every step of the way.

Established in 1997, our law firm has served the residents of North Carolina for more than 23 years now. During this time, we have grown to include 11 law offices across the state, and we have secured millions of dollars in settlements and verdicts for our plaintiff clients, including numerous multimillion-dollar awards.

At our law firm, we handle all types of personal injury and wrongful death claims arising from car and truck accidents, medical malpractice, sexual assault, products and premises liability, and more. In addition, we can also assist with helping you obtain your rightful workers' compensation or Social Security Disability claims if a job-related illness or injury has left you unable to work.

Honored for our success, our attorneys have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers, including designations as Top 100 Trial Lawyers from The National Trial Lawyers and America's Top 100 High Stakes Litigators. We have also received many positive testimonials from our satisfied clients who have praised us for our compassion and integrity as well as our aggressive approach at helping them get the justice they deserve.

To find out how you can put a heavyweight in your corner to fight for your future, you can contact the Lanier Law Group P.A. to schedule a free initial consultation. We also offer virtual consultations to help keep you and your family safe in these uncertain times.
